Articles.Content: I've been playing KSP and checking out the forums for a few months now, so I figured it was time to sign up so I can post whatever contributions I may have. I'm looking forward to sharing knowledge and stories of my many successful failures!

Greetings, and welcome to the forums!

There is a great wealth of knowledge and good advice here, along with a very friendly community. May it add to your fun.

Happy Landings!
Welcome aboard, cadet! We're always glad to see people join along in the fun! *salutes*
